UPDATES


3/20/2025Includes final USTM area forecasts for remaining part of state.
9/5/2024Includes final MAG forecasts.
1/22/2025Includes final Summit/Wasatch forecasts.
9/5/2024Includes final MAG forecasts.
4/29/2024Includes final Washington County forecasts.
4/10/2024Includes Cache County final forecasts and updated MAG draft forecasts.
2/2024Includes WFRC final forecasts and MAG draft forecasts.
11/2021Includes WFRC/MAG forecasts using the v8.3.2 TDM. Link to Previous Release (November 2021)
12/2020Other areas of the state were last updated. Link to Previous Release (December 2020)

IMPORTANT


This data is for informational purposes and must be field verified prior to being used on a project.

Please direct questions to:

Natalia Brown, UDOT
nataliabrown@utah.gov

Suzie Swim, WFRC
sswim@wfrc.org

Jared Lillywhite, MAG
jlillywhite@mountainland.org

Jeff Gilbert, Cache MPO
jeff.gilbert@cachecounty.gov

Nick Gayer, Dixie MPO
ngayer@fivecounty.utah.gov

ADJUSTMENT FACTORS


The volumes in this map are Annual Average Daily Traffic. To obtain weekday or seasonal adjustment factors, please visit the CCS Factors Map.
